name: K7 RUN
description:
K7 is an affable nickname given by brazilians for the great recording format: audio cassette!

So you're a K7, trying to reach the end level.

You have to pass the finish line, avoid the obstacles, deal with the rewind mode, and all before time runs out. Good luck!

The game was made in six days for the Brackeys Game Jam with the theme Rewind.

This game was made for André Passos, Beatriz Rangel and Jeã Caldas.

Install Instructions

Download the zip file and extract the file, click on the K7run.exe file and have fun.
